title: Michael Fasstrender 7/8: Tokyo Olympics, Climate Change, Sex Life, Vaccines, Ron DeSantis, Michael Avenatti, EuroCup, NBA
itunes:title: Michael Fasstrender 7/8: Tokyo Olympics, Climate Change, Sex Life, Vaccines, Ron DeSantis, Michael Avenatti, EuroCup, NBA
description:
In this edition of Michael Fasstrender, Jack and Miles discuss the Olympics moving forward with no crowds, the millions dying every year from abnormal temperatures, THAT scene in Netflix's 'Sex Life', undervaccinated clusters putting everyone at risk, Gov. DeSantis having no interest protecting his constituency, Michael Avenatti being sentenced to 2.5 years in Nike case, a EuroCupdate, NBA news

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
